QuestData.Title: Rise No More!
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the ghosts wandering the graveyard?$B$BThey are risen ancestors, the spirits of slain mogu who have been called back to this world.$B$BWhen angered, they attack swiftly and silently, and their numbers increase by the day.$B$BThey do not belong here. Destroy them, and send them back beyond the grave.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful work, $c. This will help our offensive a great deal.
